sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya suka melihat kera di kebun binatang.
english translation: I like to see monkeys at the zoo.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Ibu membuat kerajinan tangan dari bahan-bahan alami.
english translation: Mother makes handcrafts from natural materials.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Petani menggunakan kerbau untuk membajak sawah.
english translation: Farmers use buffalos to plow the fields.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Rambut adik saya sangat keriting dan cantik.
english translation: My younger sister's hair is very curly and beautiful.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami selalu makan kerupuk saat menonton film.
english translation: We always eat crackers while watching movies.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Dia kesal karena lupa membawa kunci rumah.
english translation: He is annoyed because he forgot to bring the house keys.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong antar saya ke sana, di seberang jalan.
english translation: Please take me there, across the street.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Anak saya belajar seni dan kesenian di sekolah.
english translation: My child learns art and crafts at school.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Teman-teman, silakan datang ke sini untuk makan malam.
english translation: Friends, please come here for dinner.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya ingin ketemu dengan teman lama saya besok.
english translation: I want to meet my old friend tomorrow.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Lebih baik memilih buah segar ketimbang makanan olahan.
english translation: It's better to choose fresh fruits rather than processed food.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sayur favorit saya adalah ketimun.
english translation: My favorite vegetable is cucumber.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bumbu masakan ini perlu tambahan ketumbar.
english translation: This dish needs some coriander.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kami makan ketupat saat merayakan Idul Fitri.
english translation: We eat rice cake when celebrating Eid al-Fitr.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Buah-buahan ini harganya 15 ribu per kilo.
english translation: These fruits cost 15 thousand per kilogram.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kita harus bekerja sama untuk mencapai tujuan kita.
english translation: We need to work together to achieve our goals.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Kok kamu tidak datang ke pesta kemarin malam?
english translation: Why didn't you come to the party last night?

sentence in indonesian using the words: Sayur kol sangat sehat dan mengandung banyak serat.
english translation: Cabbage is very healthy and contains lots of fiber.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Negara ini memiliki banyak komoditi ekspor.
english translation: This country has many export commodities.

sentence in indonesian using the words: Operasi tersebut memiliki risiko komplikasi yang tinggi.
english translation: The surgery has a high risk of complications.
